name: Conversazione tra il Piccolo Meng, il Piccolo Fei e la Piccola Lulu
desc: A record of Little Meng, Little Fei and Little Lulu's conversation. It appears to only be the straightforward conversation of children. But one can dimly sense some unnameable emotion sprouting in the hearts of the children. Perhaps this sprout will continue to gradually grow until its branches stretch out across the skies, no longer able to be ignored by anyone...
iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/A Record of Little Meng, Little Fei, and Little Lulu's Conversation_icon.png
